remarks.format:
## Remarks
## Property Value The default value is <xref:System.Management.PutType>.
## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller. This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the objects returned from WMI should contain amended information. Typically, amended information is localizable information attached to the WMI object, such as object and property descriptions.
Docs.value: Returns a value indicating whether the objects returned from WMI should contain amended information.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
## Property Value `true` if the objects returned from WMI should contain amended information; otherwise, `false`. The default value is `false`.
## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller. This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
